price: Эй инсон, улуғ Парвардигоринг борасида сени нима алдаб қўйди?!
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-insānu mā gharraka birabbika al-karīmi
